author: Saheli Roy Choudhury
title: Asia markets set to trade higher ahead of high-level trade talks between US and China
description: High-level trade talks between the world's two largest economies are due to start on Thursday, but reports said that Chinese officials are growing hesitant to pursue a broad trade deal with the United States.
content:
Asia markets looked set to gain on Tuesday, with Nikkei futures pointing to a higher open in Japan while Chinese markets are due to re-open following a week-long public holiday.
In Australia, the benchmark ASX 200 notched a 0.37% gain in early trade, with mo… [+2494 chars]
